ygData.subject: Re: Inside scoop from GZ
ygData.msgSnippet: Greg, Not a whole lot of info?  You re joking - that s priceless stuff.  These are some of the Bard s major complaints that you and he have addressed here. Let
ygData.messageBody:
Greg,

Not a whole lot of info? You're joking - that's priceless stuff. These are
some of the Bard's major complaints that you and he have addressed here.

Let me summarize -

Q) There was recently a change made to the level 23 bard song - Selo's
Consanent Chain. This song now will not effect MOBs that are SoW'd.
A) That was an unintentional bug from fixing something else - it has hopefully
been fixed with this patch.

Q) Why when I'm playing my drum does it look like I'm strumming a stick?
A) We lost an animation somewhere - hopefully it will be fixed when we do our
art patch.

Q) Bard skills that are capped at 40 (forage, sneak, hide). This limit is so
low that the skill is useless.
A) I'll check on that.

Q) How about letting us know when our missing songs will be implemented?
A) There are very few that are not in - and they are waiting for something...
:)


Crier Sharpsong - 20th song (CHING! LAST NIGHT IN PERMAFROST BABY!) bard on
Fennin Ro


Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 06, 1999 6:02 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Inside scoop from GZ


> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> I recently sent Geoffrey Zatkin an email with a couple questions and gripes
> about our class. Nothing too major, just looking for some info. To my
> surprise, he sent me back a fairly prompt response. I've included my
> original message, along with his comments below. Not a whole lot of info,
> but its something.
>
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 38 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
